int  aLoadValue 
)

Function that creates test interference “instance” and starts the interference process.

Parameters:
aType type of interference
aLoadValue value of load - percent for cpu, megabytes for memory, ignored for ioload

pointer to interference struct.

testInterference* ti_start_interference_timed ( TInterferenceType  aType,
int  aIdleTime,
int  aBusyTime,
int  aLoadValue 
)

Function that creates test interference “instance” and starts the interference process, which will contiuously sleep and resume for given time periods

Parameters:
aType type of interference
aIdleTime time for which process will be sleeping during cycle
aBusyTime time for which interference will be active
aLoadValue value of load - percent for cpu, megabytes for memory, ignored for ioload
Returns:
pointer to interference struct.

void ti_stop_interference ( testInterference *  aInterference  ) 

Stops the interference and destroys interference struct.

Parameters:
aInterference interference structure pointer, destroyed inside the function, no need to deallocate it.
Returns:
none.
